snippet.title: Build A Tesla Car Configurator | Tailwind & Vanilla JavaScript

snippet.title: Create A Booking App From Scratch | React, Next.js, Appwrite, Tailwind
snippet.description:
In this 4-hour project-based course, we will build a booking app for meeting/conference rooms. We will be using React/Next along wth Appwrite, which is an open-source, all-in-one platform with databases, authentication, storage and more.

Visit Appwrite and claim $50 in free Appwrite Cloud Pro credits:
https://apwr.dev/traversymedia50

Final Code & Theme Files:
https://github.com/bradtraversy/bookit-app

Check Out My Courses:
https://traversymedia.com

snippet.title: Encore Crash Course - TypeScript Backend Framework & Toolset
snippet.description:
This is a first look and crash course for Encore, which is a backend framework & entire backend toolset with a Rust runtime, API validation, integrated infrastructure, developer dashboard and much more. We will be building a URL shortener service.

Code:
https://github.com/bradtraversy/encore-url-shortener

Encore Website:
https://encore.dev

Timestamps:

0:00 - Intro
1:29 - Slides
7:41 - Installation & Setup
10:43 - Running Encore & Dev Dashboard

14:28 - URL Params
15:52 - Query Params
18:55 - Start URL Shortener
20:22 - URL POST Endpoint
23:41 - PostgreSQL & Migration
27:49 - Encore DB Shell
28:50 - URL GET Endpoint
32:41 - Deploy To The Cloud
33:51 - Test Cloud API With CURL

snippet.title: Ultimate Guide To Web Scraping - Node.js & Python (Puppeteer & Beautiful Soup)
snippet.description:
In this guide you will learn all about web scraping. We will go through some slides and then scrape a website using Node.js and the Puppeteer library as well as Python and the Beautiful Soup library.

Check Out Our Sponsor: Bright Data @BrightData 
https://brdta.com/traversy

Code:
https://github.com/bradtraversy/web-scraper-youtube

snippet.title: 5 Reasons Why Your Side Projects Are Failing
snippet.description:
Web development side projects often fail, including many of my own. Let's talk about some of the reasons why this happens with some examples from my own experience.

Check Out My Courses:
https://traversymedia.com

Social Media:
https://x.com/traversymedia
https://www.instagram.com/traversymedia
https://www.facebook.com/traversymedia
https://github.com/bradtraversy

snippet.title: Admin Dashboard From Scratch - Next.js, TypeScript, Shadcn/ui

Check out the sponsor, Mailtrap:
https://l.rw.rw/traversy_media

https://github.com/bradtraversy/traversypress-ui

 This project will use the following technologies:

- React/Next.js
- Shadcn/ui
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Recharts
- Lucide React
- React Hook Form & Zod
